task.title: Creating test cases
task.shortdesc: Build and execute test cases for Stripe API endpoints in Postman.

context.p: After configuring Postman, you can create test cases to validate API responses.

step.cmd: Go to your collection and select Add a request.
Add test scripts to validate responses.
Use Postman variables for dynamic data.

result.p: Your test cases will automatically validate API responses and save relevant data for subsequent tests.
